content: Want me to whip something up for ya?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: Leave the cooking to me, satisfaction guaranteed!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: This morning, I was dozing off on someone's car roof, and the car suddenly started up! And then...{短暂停} I guess I'm lost here now!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: Hi, I'm <style=NpcName>Bhadra</style>, the wild and free gemsmith! {A心虚目移}I live in... uh, well, that's not important.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: <style=SizeBig>Bhan? What a peculiar ore!</style> {A疑惑}Wait, it's a new pal! You out here mining too?
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: There's no law that says price is what matters the most, {A得意}just like there isn't one that says... you can't ride on the roof of the car!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦
NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: I can give you one! Wanna play a rock-guessing game? I've got two stones right here. Come on, close your eyes and pick one!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: Bhan, bhan-bhan! Bhaaaan~ <style=SizeBig>Here we go!</style> It's a...{短暂停} goldflux ore! Alright, it's yours.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: They say goldflux ore's worth a lot, is that why everyone wants it?{短暂停} {A虎啸}Not me.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: If you come across any ore that's too tough to break, come find me. I'll smash it with one pawstrike!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content: But no biggie, I've got loads of experience with being lost! Now that I'm here, I may as well... {A虎掌碎石}smash and break and find all the good stuff, bhan!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
{test}For real!?
Well, you've got me convinced!
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
{test}{A沉醉闻}But before that, Bhan... uh... Bhan... HUNGRY!
If only there was some delicious braised meat...
Seafood works too, as long as it's meat.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1012巴彦_巴彦

content:
{test}{A打招呼}Bhan's gotta go explore around some more,
Just make sure you got my contact info...
Well then, byne-byne!
